caption.p: Comparative bar plot of the flexural and tensile properties of composites based on ELO epoxy resin cross-linked with MNA/MLO mixture and flax fabric reinforcement with different surface treatments: ( A) flexural modulus, ( B) tensile modulus, ( C) flexural strength, ( D) tensile strength, ( E) maximum flexural deflection, and ( F) % elongation at break.
